data.lyric:
[ti:Beggin']
[ar:Måneskin]
[al:Chosen]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Beggin' - Måneskin
[00:00.17]Lyrics by：Peggy Farina/Bob Gaudio
[00:00.34]Composed by：Peggy Farina/Bob Gaudio
[00:00.51]Put your loving hand out baby
[00:10.52]
[00:12.18]'Cause I'm beggin'
[00:17.32]
[00:25.50]I'm beggin' beggin' you
[00:28.85]So put your loving hand out baby
[00:32.36]I'm beggin' beggin' you
[00:35.94]So put your loving hand out darlin'
[00:39.13]
[00:39.77]Riding high
[00:40.63]
[00:41.40]When I was king
[00:42.50]
[00:43.24]I played it hard and fast 'cause I had everything
[00:46.08]
[00:46.63]I walked away you won me then
[00:49.62]
[00:50.26]But easy come and easy go and it would end
[00:52.95]So anytime I bleed you let me go
[00:54.80]Yah anytime I feed you get me know
[00:56.87]Anytime I seek you let me know
[00:58.38]But I planted that seed just let me go
[01:00.40]I'm on my knees when I'm beggin'
[01:02.15]'Cause I don't wanna lose you
[01:04.36]
[01:05.26]Hey yeah ra-ta-ta-ta
[01:08.20]'Cause I'm beggin' beggin' you
[01:11.77]Uh put your loving hand out baby
[01:15.34]I'm beggin' beggin' you ah
[01:19.04]And put your loving hand out darlin'
[01:22.25]I need you to understand
[01:24.94]
[01:25.71]Tried so hard to be your man
[01:29.33]The kind of man you want in the end
[01:32.33]Only then can I begin to live again
[01:36.22]
[01:36.90]An empty shell
[01:38.05]
[01:38.64]I used to be
[01:39.79]
[01:40.42]The shadow of my life was hangin' over me
[01:43.37]
[01:43.92]A broken man
[01:45.08]
[01:45.73]That I don't know
[01:46.89]
[01:47.60]Won't even stand the devil's dance to win my soul
[01:50.28]What we doin'
[01:51.17]What we chasin'
[01:52.10]Why the bottom
[01:52.98]Why the basement
[01:53.93]Why we got good s**t don't embrace it
[01:55.58]Why the feel for the need to replace me
[01:57.42]You're the wrong way track from the good
[01:58.91]I want to paint a picture tellin' where we could be at
[02:01.10]Like a heart in the best way should
[02:02.52]You can give it away you had it and you took the pay
[02:04.72]But I keep walkin' on keep openin' doors
[02:06.80]Keep hopin' for now the door is yours
[02:08.64]Keep also home
[02:09.60]'Cause I don't want to live in a broken home girl I'm beggin'
[02:12.04]
[02:13.25]Mmm yeah-yeah yeah I'm beggin' beggin' you
[02:18.13]So put your loving hand out baby
[02:21.69]I'm beggin' beggin' you
[02:25.20]So put your loving hand out darlin'
[02:28.42]I'm fighting hard to hold my own
[02:31.27]
[02:31.92]Just can't make it all alone
[02:34.76]
[02:35.60]I'm holding on I can't fall back
[02:38.73]I'm just a calm 'bout to fade to black
[02:42.43]
[02:43.16]I'm beggin' beggin' you
[02:46.50]
[02:47.14]Put your loving hand out baby
[02:50.35]I'm beggin' beggin' you
[02:53.95]So put your loving hand out darlin'
[02:57.60]I'm beggin' beggin' you
[03:01.05]So put your loving hand out baby
[03:04.66]I'm beggin' beggin' you
[03:08.22]So put your loving hand out darlin'
[03:11.78]I'm beggin' beggin' you
[03:15.45]So put your loving hand out baby
[03:19.06]I'm beggin' beggin' you
[03:22.57]So put your loving hand out
data.trans:
[ti:Beggin']
[ar:Måneskin]
[al:Chosen]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.17]//
[00:00.34]//
[00:00.51]宝贝伸出你的双手
[00:10.52]
[00:12.18]因为我在恳求
[00:17.32]
[00:25.50]我苦苦恳求你
[00:28.85]所以宝贝伸出你的双手
[00:32.36]我苦苦恳求你
[00:35.94]所以伸出你的双手 亲爱的
[00:39.13]
[00:39.77]当我是国王时
[00:40.63]
[00:41.40]高高在上
[00:42.50]
[00:43.24]我沉浸在玩乐之中 因我坐拥一切
[00:46.08]
[00:46.63]当我离开时 你便渴望我
[00:49.62]
[00:50.26]但感情来得快去得也快 一切都会走向终结
[00:52.95]所以任何时间你需要你放手
[00:54.80]每当我渴望你 你会明白我的意思
[00:56.87]任何时间我想见你 让我知道
[00:58.38]但我在心中已播种 就让我茁壮成长吧
[01:00.40]我跪地苦苦恳求你
[01:02.15]因为我不愿失去你
[01:04.36]
[01:05.26]//
[01:08.20]我苦苦恳求你
[01:11.77]宝贝伸出你的双手
[01:15.34]我苦苦恳求你
[01:19.04]亲爱的伸出你双手
[01:22.25]我需要你明白
[01:24.94]
[01:25.71]竭力去做你心目中的人
[01:29.33]与你终老的人
[01:32.33]只有如此我才可以感到活着
[01:36.22]
[01:36.90]我曾经是
[01:38.05]
[01:38.64]一具空壳
[01:39.79]
[01:40.42]过去的阴影一直在笼罩着我
[01:43.37]
[01:43.92]一个心碎的人
[01:45.08]
[01:45.73]但是我不知道
[01:46.89]
[01:47.60]我甚至无法与恶魔共舞 赢回我的灵魂
[01:50.28]我们究竟在做什么
[01:51.17]我们在追逐着什么
[01:52.10]为何在低谷
[01:52.98]为何他们在地下室
[01:53.93]为何我们拥有美好 却不欣然接受
[01:55.58]为何你想要让别人替代我呢
[01:57.42]你慢慢地走上歧途
[01:58.91]我想随心所欲 与你一起绘画
[02:01.10]就如被抛弃的那一颗心
[02:02.52]你习惯抛弃你所拥有的 直至你再次夺回来
[02:04.72]但我一直前行 黎明时分一直前行
[02:06.80]现在由你定夺
[02:08.64]随心所欲
[02:09.60]因为我不愿生活在破碎的家 女孩我在苦苦恳求
[02:12.04]
[02:13.25]我苦苦恳求你
[02:18.13]所以宝贝伸出你的双手
[02:21.69]我苦苦恳求你
[02:25.20]所以伸出你的双手 亲爱的
[02:28.42]我在努力争取 坚定自己立场
[02:31.27]
[02:31.92]我只是一个人无法做到
[02:34.76]
[02:35.60]哦在苦苦坚持 
[02:38.73]我绝不能退缩
[02:42.43]
[02:43.16]我苦苦恳求你
[02:46.50]
[02:47.14]宝贝伸出你的双手
[02:50.35]我苦苦恳求你
[02:53.95]所以伸出你的双手 亲爱的
[02:57.60]我苦苦恳求你
[03:01.05]所以宝贝伸出你的双手
[03:04.66]我苦苦恳求你
[03:08.22]所以伸出你的双手 亲爱的
[03:11.78]我苦苦恳求你
[03:15.45]所以宝贝伸出你的双手
[03:19.06]我苦苦恳求你
[03:22.57]所以伸出你的双手
